equipment.name: 1st Stage Suction Scrubber
equipment.function: Knockout liquids before 1st stage compressors; stabilize suction volume.
operator_checks: Drain Seal Drum / drain logic status
Fuel gas to seal drum (if applicable)
Manual drain readiness (if auto drain unavailable)
notes: Must be kept empty of liquid during operation to protect compressors.

equipment.name: 1st Stage Heat Exchanger
equipment.function: Cool hot gas after 1st stage from ~220°F to ~120°F before 2nd stage suction.

equipment.name: CRU Discharge Vessel
equipment.function: Collect condensate after E-103; separate lean gas to HP system; control discharge pressure.
